name: Murder Begone
description:
Overview

Team: Merge Conflict Entertainment
Projekttitel: Murder Begone (https://murder-begone.ga/)
Genre: Environmental Adventure
Perspective: FPS
Target audience: 16+
Gamemode: Singleplayer
Platforms: PC
Controls: Mouse & Keyboard
Engine: Unreal

Game Vision
Murder begone is a First Person Adventure set in an american motel. The player must cover up foul play interacting with the world and solving puzzles in order not to be convicted.

Experience
• First person adventure (e.g. Gone Home, What Remains of Edith Finch, Blackwood Crossing)
• 1990-2000 setting in a motel (e.g. Heavy Rain)
• depressing atmosphere
